name: adventure puppy
description:
a small walk around, with a few areas and an ending you can get to.

use the arrow keys to move and bump into things to interact.  look around, talk to everyone; you might make a friend.

(gravity is very optional when outside.)

this was my first try at making a game since Hypercard I reckon; made to get to know bitsy.

credits
  • Bitsy
  • Animal sprites
  • Palletsy
  • Alphabet blocks base
  • Directional avatar sprite flip
  • Bitsymuse

The music heard in this game is by me and available (with more tracks) as part of cute loops.
